Uses of Class
gdpcore.BinList

Uses of BinList in gdpcore
 

Methods in gdpcore that return BinList
private  BinList BinList.computeDistance()
          Computes the distance to the expressed genes of the current list.
private  BinList BinList.computeDistanceNoInfluence(BinList listThresholdHighGenes, int distanceNoInfluence)
          Deletes the values of the current list under influence of genes more expressed of the listThresholdHighGenes.
 BinList BinList.divideBy(BinList controlList, int filter, boolean normalized)
          Divides the current list by a control list for every bin where the controlList value is higher than the value of filter.
 BinList BinList.gauss(int sigma)
          Applies a gaussian filter on the BinList and returns the result in a new BinList.
 BinList BinList.index(double saturation)
          Indexes the intensities between 0 and 100 based on the highest and the lowest value of the whole genome.
 BinList BinList.indexByChromo(double saturation)
          Indexes the intensities between 0 and 100 based on the highest and the lowest value of each chromosome.
 BinList BinList.log(double damper)
          Applies the function f(x) = log2(x + damper) to each element x of the current BinList.
 BinList BinList.minus(BinList aBinList)
          Subtracts the current list by the list in parameter.
 BinList BinList.normalize(int factor)
          Divides each bin by the total of reads in the file.
private  BinList BinList.selectFromThreshold(double thresholdDown, double thresholdUp)
          Returns a list with values set to 1 when for the values of the current list between thresholdDown and thresholdUp and 0 otherwise.
 

Methods in gdpcore with parameters of type BinList
private  BinList BinList.computeDistanceNoInfluence(BinList listThresholdHighGenes, int distanceNoInfluence)
          Deletes the values of the current list under influence of genes more expressed of the listThresholdHighGenes.
 double BinList.correlation(BinList list)
          Computes the coefficient of correlation between the current BinList and another BinList.
 double BinList.correlation(BinList list, boolean[] chromoList)
          Computes the coefficient of correlation between the current BinList and another BinList.
 void BinList.distanceOnIntensity(BinList listDistance, double thresholdDown, double thresholdUp, int distanceNoInfluence, java.lang.String filePath)
          Calculates for every genomic position the timing of replication and the distance to the closest gene expressed between thresholdDown and thresholdUp and at least distanceNoInfluence bins far from more expressed genes.
 BinList BinList.divideBy(BinList controlList, int filter, boolean normalized)
          Divides the current list by a control list for every bin where the controlList value is higher than the value of filter.
 BinList BinList.minus(BinList aBinList)
          Subtracts the current list by the list in parameter.
private  void BinList.printDistanceOnIntensity(BinList listDistance, java.lang.String filePath)
          Prints the values of distances on intensities in a file.
